Health data is personal data and is considered sensitive. It is subject to special protection under the law (European regulation on the protection of personal data - RGPD, Loi Informatique et Libertés, Code de la santé publique, etc.) in order to guarantee respect for the privacy of individuals.

question.question: What is a key characteristic of health data?
question.option_a: It is public data that can be shared freely.
question.option_b: It is considered sensitive and subject to special protection under the law.
question.option_c: It is only protected when it is used for research purposes.
question.option_d: It is not considered personal data.
